title: The ultimate “period” box for me!
content: This box of Tampax Pearl Trio Pack in regular, super and super plus sizes is the perfect box of tampons for my “girl week” needs. It gives me the right amount of each diff absorption/sizes I need to get me thru my whole period from start to finish without having to buy multiple boxes and take up storage space under my bathroom sink. I just buy one box that comes with everything I need. It's like A PERIOD KIT IN A BOX. I love it!
